title: Vegan Life Restaurant - maybe closed
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Vegan restaurant uses fresh, organic and natural vegetables in creating fusion dishes. Also uses no garlic or onion. Serves noodle dishes, whole-grain brown rice, soy seafood and soy meat dishes, some of which are made-in-house. Juices are made from fresh fruits with little or no added sugar or water. Operated by young vegan enthusiasts, families and college students frequently dine in the cozy ambiance with soft music in background. Wi-fi available. NOTE: maybe closed/shut down, please verify and let HappyCow know.
streetAddress: 2193, Jalan Batu Sinar, Taman Bandar Baru
